name: Fusionmorph: Red-Eyes
text: Discard one of the following monsters from your hand, then change 1 monster you control whose original name is "Red-Eyes Black Dragon" into one of the following monsters: ● Level 6 Fiend-Type Normal Monster: "Black Skull Dragon" ● Level 6 Dragon-Type Normal Monster: "Meteor Black Dragon" ● Level 4 EARTH Warrior-Type Normal Monster: "Red-Eyes Slash Dragon" This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
